ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and silver doors to their houses and silver couches on which to recline,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And doors (of silver) for their houses, (silver) couches for reclining,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and (silver) doors to their houses, and couches (of silver) upon which they would recline;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: doors for their houses, couches on which to recline,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And doors of silver for their houses and couches of silver upon which they would recline.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And for their houses, doors, and thrones on which they could recline,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And the doors of their houses and the couches on which they recline,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and doors to their houses, and couches whereon to recline,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And for their houses doors (of silver) and couches of silver whereon to recline,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and silver doors to their houses and silver couches on which to recline,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And silver doors for their houses, and silver couches whereon they recline,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and [silver] doors for their houses and [silver] couches on which they recline,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And (silver) doors to their houses, and thrones (of silver) on which they could recline,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And for their houses, doors (of silver), and thrones (of silver) on which they could recline,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: with doors to their houses and couches on which to recline;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And doors to their houses, and furnishings on which they recline.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And for their houses - doors and couches [of silver] upon which to recline
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [43:34] and doors, of silver, for their houses, and, We would have made for them, couches, of silver (surur, ‘couches’, is the plural of sarīr) on which they recline,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And for their houses doors (of silver) and couches of silver whereon to recline) to sleep,
